name: Sea Plumber
description:
Dive into the ocean and become a plumber of the extreme in Sea Plumber. Put your brain to the trial in this puzzle game, repair the pipes in the deep and become the champion of plumbing.

Sea Plumber is an amusing game for the whole family! Only recommended for... everyone!

CHARACTERISTICS
- 100 levels
- 300 stars to collect
- Best score
- Touch the screen to rotate the pieces

HOW TO PLAY?
Setting up a gigantic pipe system to get the water of the ocean, it seemed like a good idea, until the pressure break it all! Now that everything is in a complete mess, you’ll have to solve this problem by creating a line between the two last points still in place.

Through a hundred of always more difficult levels, you’ll have to create a way so that the water can make it to the surface.
